name: Victor Cobar
body:
## Summary
***
Versatile Software Engineer with more than 10 years of experience in software development – from prototyping iterative deliveries, to build and design applications from conception to production. Instinctual troubleshooting ability, quickly identifying errors and resolving in a timely manner, both in pressure and low risk situations.  Creative and collaborative as an individual contributor or as part of a small team.  Experienced in daily SCRUM or communicate directly to business stakeholders.

## Skills Highlights
***
**Proficient**

Ruby; Node.js; AngularJS; JavaScript; jQuery; CSS; HTML; SQL; AWS Redshift; AWS ElasticBeanstalk; Grunt; AWS Lambda; AWS S3; AWS CloudFront; GIT; JIRA; TeamCity; Agile/SCRUM Methodology

**Experienced**

C# .NET; Java Spring; Maven; PHP; PostgreSQL; MySQL; Microsoft SQL Server;  SharePoint 2013

## Employment
***
**Software Engineer** -- **CafePress Inc.** -- **June 2011 – August 2016**
* Optimized landing page tool workflow by using AngularJS modules as templates to create multiple pages, driven by JSON data objects.
* Lead the development of site navigation to use topic taxonomy, resulting in an increase of 5% traffic. 
* Improved pageviews, device detection, and business unit detection data reports to near real-time, processing over 1.2 million records a day.
* Port Ruby search data collection system to Java to remove dependencies and reduce technical debt.
* Designed and develop search data collection system to track impressions, clicks, and add-to-carts in Ruby, collecting over 15 million records a day.
* Implement Piwik Open Analytics Platform into AWS Elastic Beanstalk with an AWS RDS MySQL Database, collecting user behavior to produce a page overlay Heatmap.
* Create and implement Snowplow Analytics event data tracking system using AWS CloudFront, AWS S3, AWS ElasticMapReduce, and AWS Redshift to track site visitors.
* Contributed code to a content classification system using Java and Spring Boot, categorizing images into different categories using Google’s Prediction API.
* Integrated order management middleware in Ruby that translated Amazon Orders.
* Automated product uploads of 5 million a day by integrating with Amazon’s Marketplace APIs with Ruby to increase marketplace presence, uploading five times the amount of products a day.

**Web Developer** -- **PotreroMedia Corporation** -- **August  2006 – June 2011**
* Facilitated in the implementation of new customers into a marketing delivery system, interfacing and troubleshooting with clients on a weekly basis.
* Championed form functionality, validation, and session form processing for over 100 websites.
* Implement design creative into valid HTML and CSS for over 2 websites a month.
* Create single page websites with a multi-page form using AJAX.

## Additional Experience
***
* Features for Educational Media Website (February 2011).  Created dynamic menu text on hover, a rotating content slideshow, expandable/collapsible content blocks, and integrate SimplePress forums plug-in for WordPress.
* Website for Online Gaming Community (2000 - 2003).  From inception to execution, created site design and look and feel, built out a website with player bios, calendar schedule, and community forums.

## Education
***
**B.S. Management Information Systems** -- **2003**
California State University of Sacramento – Sacramento, CA
